ai-ja431:1.1_0: I have heard the Great Brahmā,
ai-ja431:1.2_0: ate it, abandoned the pleasures of the senses.
ai-ja431:2.2_0: as you have heard your words,
ai-ja431:3.3_0: as well as what’s given up,
ai-ja431:3.4_0: What can one not get rid of hate?”
ai-ja431:4.2_0: in the world, fearing nothing from any quarter;
ai-ja431:5.3_0: that astute person is indeed intelligent,
ai-ja431:5.4_0: Such is right to say so.”
ai-ja431:7.2_0: your complexion is full of lust.
ai-ja431:8.1_0: “The dark of the night is full of sensual pleasures,
ai-ja431:8.3_0: I’ve been searching for the root of all,
ai-ja431:9.4_0: leads to rebirth in the Brahmā realm.”
ai-ja431:10.1_0: he has gone to the fifth.
